Text: Congratulations are your appointment to Chief Executive Officer of Enron A well deserved appointment and one that will keep Enron on its incredible performance path I look forward to expeditiously resolving the issues we have at Azurix without tarnishing the image or performance you have worked so diligently to create at Enron Good luck and God Speed John L Garrison President and Chief Executive Officer Azurix Corp Office Fax
